ruleSet.title: Single Source of Truth (SSoT)
ruleSet.requirement: Every system has exactly ONE authoritative JSON file as source-of-truth
ruleSet.reflection: All documentation generated FROM that JSON
ruleSet.enforcement: CI/CD blocks commits with manually-edited generated docs

ruleSet.title: Auto-Generation Pipeline
ruleSet.requirement: Every JSON authority file MUST have a corresponding generation script
ruleSet.pipeline: All generation scripts run in pre:manifests pipeline before build
ruleSet.order: Registry generation (creates JSON) → Documentation generation (reads JSON)
ruleSet.enforcement: Automatically enforced on every npm run build

ruleSet.title: Generated Document Marking
ruleSet.header: All auto-generated markdown files MUST have <!-- AUTO-GENERATED -->
ruleSet.footer: All auto-generated files MUST have <!-- DO NOT EDIT - Regenerate with: npm run build -->
ruleSet.audit: Scripts scan for manually-edited marked files and fail build

ruleSet.title: No Manual Documentation
ruleSet.prohibition: Developers MUST NOT hand-write documentation marked as auto-generated
ruleSet.alternative: Update the JSON source → script regenerates the markdown
ruleSet.enforcement: Pre-commit hook blocks commits that edit auto-generated files

documentationStructure.description: Each domain has its own documentation structure with explicit governance on drift-proof (auto-generated) vs drift-capable (manual) documents

rules.title: Domain-Scoped Documentation
rules.statement: Each domainSequence has dedicated documentation folders for generated and manual docs
rules.enforcement: Build fails if docs found outside designated domain paths

rules.title: Drift-Proof Vs Drift-Capable Classification
rules.statement: Every document classified as auto-generated (drift-proof) or manual (drift-capable)
rules.enforcement: Audit detects unclassified documents; CI reports drift risk

rules.title: No Root-Level Domain Documentation
rules.statement: No domain-specific docs in repository root; all docs live in docs/generated/{domain-id}/ or docs/manual/{domain-id}/
rules.enforcement: Root folder contains only global governance and indexing docs

rules.title: Domain Documentation Index Required
rules.statement: Each domain generates docs/{generated|manual}/{domain-id}/INDEX.md listing all domain docs and drift status
rules.enforcement: Build fails if domain index missing or out-of-sync

rules.title: Orphaned Document Detection
rules.statement: Documents not referenced by any domain or generation script flagged as orphaned
rules.enforcement: Audit reports orphaned docs; recommendation to archive or migrate
